4bb5a67d-0b3d-43b7-bd37-c08e34ca750b.name: Algebra
4bb5a67d-0b3d-43b7-bd37-c08e34ca750b.one liner: Algebra is the branch of mathematics concerning the study of the rules of operations and relations, and the constructions and concepts arising from them, including terms, polynomials, equations and algebraic structures.

a6bbad4a-abd5-4e7e-8cf1-ed9cd4bda0e3.name: Mastering SciPy
a6bbad4a-abd5-4e7e-8cf1-ed9cd4bda0e3.title: Mastering SciPy
a6bbad4a-abd5-4e7e-8cf1-ed9cd4bda0e3.one liner: Implement state-of-the-art techniques to visualize solutions to challenging problems in scientific computing, with the use of the SciPy stack

ce6a1fcb-3911-4eb7-9686-3dbc6c3b1aca.name: Memcached
ce6a1fcb-3911-4eb7-9686-3dbc6c3b1aca.one liner: Memcached is a simple distributed object cache that caches information in memory, and can be used to improve the performance of dynamic web applications by reducing access time and database load.

f9fef1e3-aa79-4111-9b11-059ac746aba9.name: Skin
f9fef1e3-aa79-4111-9b11-059ac746aba9.one liner: skin is set of properties (skin parameters) used to change the appearance of an application through setting the colors and decoration of controls and components

f6c908fe-4206-4f31-b7fc-eb799775dedc.name: Node.Js
f6c908fe-4206-4f31-b7fc-eb799775dedc.one liner: Node.js is an event-based, non-blocking, asynchronous I/O framework that uses Google's V8 JavaScript engine. It is used for developing applications that make heavy use of the ability to run JavaScript both on the client, as well as on server side and therefore benefit from the re-usability of code and the lack of context switching.

de5b46e9-4519-4a57-b6fb-6b866d341a97.name: Lucene
de5b46e9-4519-4a57-b6fb-6b866d341a97.one liner: The term Lucene refers to the Java fulltext search engine library, but also to the entire eco-system that grew around it, including lucene.net, solr, elasticsearch and zend-search-lucene.

2e4ad63d-6404-4d27-b751-eb4da3ab14b4.name: Ode
2e4ad63d-6404-4d27-b751-eb4da3ab14b4.one liner: ODE (ordinary differential equation) is a differential equation where the unknown function only has one independent variable and its derivatives.

e8ff5667-5ddb-4e2a-abed-1415cdaee5b1.name: Rapid Flask [Video]
e8ff5667-5ddb-4e2a-abed-1415cdaee5b1.title: Rapid Flask [Video]
e8ff5667-5ddb-4e2a-abed-1415cdaee5b1.one liner: Get your web applications up and running in no time with Flask

9c800b56-0dd2-472c-99d2-e79d30b16796.name: PostgreSQL Cookbook
9c800b56-0dd2-472c-99d2-e79d30b16796.title: PostgreSQL Cookbook
9c800b56-0dd2-472c-99d2-e79d30b16796.one liner: Over 90 hands-on recipes to effectively manage, administer, and design solutions using PostgreSQL

cda0fa18-d036-4b24-9362-ff68ca006a5f.name: Cherrypy
cda0fa18-d036-4b24-9362-ff68ca006a5f.one liner: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented HTTP framework. See cherrypy.org for more information.

e6a64ef3-3aa7-482d-8d8d-70c227705887.name: Machine Learning
e6a64ef3-3aa7-482d-8d8d-70c227705887.one liner: Machine learning revolves around developing self learning computer algorithms that function by virtue of discovering patterns in data and making intelligent decisions based on such patterns.

4ea7f869-19ec-4b4b-8033-499b295b1c98.name: Traffic
4ea7f869-19ec-4b4b-8033-499b295b1c98.one liner: Term used to refer to the amount or flow of data around a network or website

fc673b87-856f-48e1-a7f0-6aa70b903c61.name: Pyramid
fc673b87-856f-48e1-a7f0-6aa70b903c61.one liner: A Python-based web framework provided by the Pylons Project

24a450bc-41ee-4109-8d9c-cc55301b6d3b.name: Https
24a450bc-41ee-4109-8d9c-cc55301b6d3b.one liner: Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure (HTTPS) is a combination of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol with the SSL/TLS protocol to provide encrypted communication and secure identification of a network web server.

28d11d4e-3bbf-412b-924e-a800e5e21a2d.name: Angularjs
28d11d4e-3bbf-412b-924e-a800e5e21a2d.one liner: AngularJS is an open-source JavaScript framework. Its goal is to augment browser-based applications with Model–View–Whatever(MV*) capability and reduce the amount of JavaScript needed to make web applications functional. These types of apps are also frequently known as Single-Page Applications.

7568759b-7eec-41ee-bd29-3b2e59f7744f.name: Parallel Processing
7568759b-7eec-41ee-bd29-3b2e59f7744f.one liner: A form of data processing in which multiple calculations are carried out simultaneously.

7653838e-fb1c-4b32-9428-611c043c8156.name: Hacking
7653838e-fb1c-4b32-9428-611c043c8156.one liner: Activities related to making hardware and software do things they were not originally designed to do.

a234f247-4739-4eb6-a7fb-97796cb87f7d.name: Geography
a234f247-4739-4eb6-a7fb-97796cb87f7d.one liner: Geography is the science that deals with the study of the Earth and its lands, features, inhabitants, and phenomena.

57d26b57-9eed-43a1-9b78-4fafa2522161.name: Wxwidgets
57d26b57-9eed-43a1-9b78-4fafa2522161.one liner: wxWidgets is a cross-platform GUI framework. It is written in C++ and has bindings for Python, Perl, Ruby, and even .Net. It also supports several mobile platforms including Windows Mobile, iPhone SDK and embedded GTK+.

712c492d-3a79-4c0f-be9e-77097329eef7.name: Azure
712c492d-3a79-4c0f-be9e-77097329eef7.one liner: Microsoft Azure (formerly Windows Azure) is a Platform as a Service (PaaS) and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) cloud computing platform by Microsoft. Users of the platform can deploy their applications onto cloud hosting benefiting from on-demand service, elastic scale, and a highly managed environment on a pay-as-you-go basis.

90bad466-6202-4076-95c9-9b0fb090851c.name: Riak
90bad466-6202-4076-95c9-9b0fb090851c.one liner: Riak is a key/value data store written in Erlang. It implements principles from Amazon's Dynamo paper.

780afa95-1d2e-457a-8720-f0293a62ecd4.name: Ruby
780afa95-1d2e-457a-8720-f0293a62ecd4.one liner: Ruby is a multi-platform open-source dynamic object-oriented interpreted language created by Yukihiro Matsumoto (Matz) in 1993.

06b09a3d-1999-4196-b00c-6bb926776a52.name: Linear Algebra
06b09a3d-1999-4196-b00c-6bb926776a52.one liner: Linear Algebra is a core body of mathematics that has extensive applications in computer graphics, economics, engineering, and control systems.  Key topics: matrix, vector, simultaneous system of linear equations, diagonal form, eigenvalues, eigenvectors, projections, points, lines, planes, hyperplanes, rotations, reflections.  Popular packages for solving linear algebra problems are [tag:Matlab], [tag:Octave], [tag:Maxima], and [tag:Mathematica].

b9dd1755-0cd0-42e7-95af-b66530b296f3.name: Webdriver
b9dd1755-0cd0-42e7-95af-b66530b296f3.one liner: WebDriver is an API for controlling web browsers, imitating a real user. It's mostly used for automated tests. WebDriver has multiple language bindings and drivers (allowing to control various browsers). If your question is specific to one of them, make sure to also include the appropriate tag.

33197f8a-7011-429a-9b46-4a9838200b59.name: Air
33197f8a-7011-429a-9b46-4a9838200b59.one liner: Adobe Integrated Runtime (AIR), also known as Adobe AIR, is a cross-platform runtime environment developed by Adobe Systems for building applications targeting desktop, mobile and television systems using Adobe Flash, Adobe Flex, ActionScript 3.0, MXML, HTML, or AJAX.

97c849c9-0c33-482b-9fb9-68cf8b4abd85.name: Caching
97c849c9-0c33-482b-9fb9-68cf8b4abd85.one liner: A cache is a mechanism for temporarily storing (caching) data locally in order to reduce access time to data stored far away. For CPU/disk/web browsing please use relevant tags (cpu-cache, diskcache,...)

6dc753fd-aeb5-4136-8f80-4108ad336985.name: Point
6dc753fd-aeb5-4136-8f80-4108ad336985.one liner: A point is a fundamental geometry entity.

a4e789b2-8212-4725-a289-563e9ce536d7.name: Python GeoSpatial Analysis Essentials
a4e789b2-8212-4725-a289-563e9ce536d7.title: Python Geospatial Analysis Essentials
a4e789b2-8212-4725-a289-563e9ce536d7.one liner: Process, analyze, and display geospatial data using Python libraries and related tools

b338fa0d-6cba-4c41-be5b-12bdbec8ea69.name: Username
b338fa0d-6cba-4c41-be5b-12bdbec8ea69.one liner: A set of characters used to identify the account of a person to a system.

d8f8b412-bc7e-4b9a-89c0-578fc176bc32.name: Raspbian
d8f8b412-bc7e-4b9a-89c0-578fc176bc32.one liner: Raspbian is a free Debian-based OS for the Raspberry-Pi computer.

f6e846da-d35b-474c-a108-92953a5d14ba.name: External
f6e846da-d35b-474c-a108-92953a5d14ba.one liner: This tag refers to something that is outside of a particular system.  In other words, it is something that is not a part of the main system and therefore can be considered "extra".

ebc3eb89-ec0d-47e7-bdfe-e74dbb91a867.name: Memory
ebc3eb89-ec0d-47e7-bdfe-e74dbb91a867.one liner: Use this tag for memory management or issues in programming. For questions about memory hardware issues or errors in general software, go to http://superuser.com, or http://serverfault.com if this is related to enterprise-level hardware or software.

f68abd35-2d43-4812-a91c-211b23263add.name: Regex
f68abd35-2d43-4812-a91c-211b23263add.one liner: Regular expressions use a declarative language to match patterns within strings.  They are commonly used for string validation, parsing, and trasformation.  Since regex is not standardized, all questions with this tag should also include a tag specifying the applicable programming language or tool.

cabaddd3-fa36-474f-9560-433ab06a2ab7.name: PostgreSQL 9 Admin Cookbook
cabaddd3-fa36-474f-9560-433ab06a2ab7.title: PostgreSQL 9 Admin Cookbook
cabaddd3-fa36-474f-9560-433ab06a2ab7.one liner: By working through the recipes in this book, you can soon be running a more efficient database. Bring your PostreSQL know-how up to date in record time with a hands-on guide that covers all the vital techniques.

6766e25a-446e-4d88-9603-d666a6f46edb.name: Ansible
6766e25a-446e-4d88-9603-d666a6f46edb.one liner: Ansible is a model-driven configuration management, multi-node deployment/orchestration and remote task execution system. Uses SSH by default, so there is no special software to be installed on the nodes you manage. Ansible can be extended in any language.

7f29e0b3-a788-49a4-86b6-341abbea2b2e.name: Web Crawler
7f29e0b3-a788-49a4-86b6-341abbea2b2e.one liner: A Web crawler (also known as Web spider) is a computer program that browses the World Wide Web in a methodical, automated manner or in an orderly fashion. Other terms for Web crawlers are ants, automatic indexers, bots, Web spiders, Web robots, or – especially in the FOAF community – Web scutters.

d6d17912-eba7-4f36-becc-67d6c0bf66dc.name: Linux
d6d17912-eba7-4f36-becc-67d6c0bf66dc.one liner: GNU/Linux, commonly shortened as Linux, is an open source operating system. Use this tag only if your question relates to using Linux APIs or Linux-specific behavior. Questions relating to using or troubleshooting Linux are off topic.

769e1a00-ac5a-44b8-8cfc-de3bc1d003c1.name: Synthesis
769e1a00-ac5a-44b8-8cfc-de3bc1d003c1.one liner: Synthesis turns a high level circuit description into an implementation in logic gates.

7f41413c-f814-493d-af80-c5d7b658ffc1.name: Migrate
7f41413c-f814-493d-af80-c5d7b658ffc1.one liner: Migration is the process of moving data from container to another. This includes migration to and from physical containers (e.g. hard disks) and migration to and from logical containers.

5b88ef6e-5548-4327-a9b5-d1ae2e1df33a.name: Relation
5b88ef6e-5548-4327-a9b5-d1ae2e1df33a.one liner: A relation on sets S1, S2, ..., SN is any subset of S1 x S2 x ... x SN, where 'x' denotes the Cartesian product. In other words, a relation over N sets is any set of ordered N-tuples over the N sets.

7b7247cb-3497-48a8-8c3b-fd33b190dcdf.name: Addition
7b7247cb-3497-48a8-8c3b-fd33b190dcdf.one liner: Addition is a mathematical operation that represents combining collections of objects together into a larger collection. It is signified by the plus sign (+).

da13207b-e40e-49c1-824b-5b5c5e9febc9.name: Emacs
da13207b-e40e-49c1-824b-5b5c5e9febc9.one liner: GNU Emacs is an extensible, customizable, self-documenting text editor. At its core is an interpreter for Emacs Lisp, a dialect of the Lisp programming language with extensions to support text editing.

0a31e088-7e82-4914-9b6c-9ccca28cb274.name: Window
0a31e088-7e82-4914-9b6c-9ccca28cb274.one liner:
In computer science a window is a graphical interface to let a user interact with a program.
Questions regarding Microsoft Windows should use the "Windows" tag.

cd00d65d-ba34-4ea0-ae2f-5b6c560cca67.name: Heroku Postgres
cd00d65d-ba34-4ea0-ae2f-5b6c560cca67.one liner: Heroku Postgres is the SQL database service run by Heroku that is provisioned and managed as an add-on.

f0c67f00-28f6-4728-853b-b9a0acaa2d23.name: Intellij Idea
f0c67f00-28f6-4728-853b-b9a0acaa2d23.one liner: IntelliJ IDEA is an IDE by JetBrains. Originally created for Java, it currently supports a wide variety of languages, including JavaScript, Groovy, HTML, CSS, RSS, R, Haskell, PHP, Ruby, Python, Scala, Swift, Clojure, and Kotlin.

652e45f2-33aa-4f04-8fd7-d549c12521fa.name: NumPy Beginner's Guide - Second Edition
652e45f2-33aa-4f04-8fd7-d549c12521fa.title: NumPy Beginners Guide - Second Edition
652e45f2-33aa-4f04-8fd7-d549c12521fa.one liner: An action packed guide using real world examples of the easy to use, high performance, free open source NumPy mathematical library.

9702afb6-b712-4333-9451-498e7d136937.name: Amazon SimpleDB: LITE
9702afb6-b712-4333-9451-498e7d136937.title: Amazon SimpleDB: LITE
9702afb6-b712-4333-9451-498e7d136937.one liner: A book and eBook that addresses: what is SimpleDB, how does it compare to relational databases, and how to get started?

fc61532e-dd1b-495b-afea-7ad44f90930f.name: Financial
fc61532e-dd1b-495b-afea-7ad44f90930f.one liner: Anything related to financial calculations and processing of financial data. For example, this tag can be used for questions about interest rates calculations, stock exchange data processing, market data analysis, etc.

0a1dfbed-a660-4ec4-8c84-5919f89e555b.name: Construct
0a1dfbed-a660-4ec4-8c84-5919f89e555b.one liner: Construct is a powerful declarative parser for binary data.

f7b2d0d6-b603-4e09-9b32-5c6b036f86d2.name: Instant Vert.x
f7b2d0d6-b603-4e09-9b32-5c6b036f86d2.title: Instant Vert.x
f7b2d0d6-b603-4e09-9b32-5c6b036f86d2.one liner: A kick-start for rapid development of asynchronous network applications using the Vert.x framework

c27930da-fec7-455f-8e4f-99ce04e40d08.name: Raspberry Pi Blueprints
c27930da-fec7-455f-8e4f-99ce04e40d08.title: Raspberry Pi Blueprints
c27930da-fec7-455f-8e4f-99ce04e40d08.one liner: Design and build your own hardware projects that interact with the real world using the Raspberry Pi

0221cb01-7c95-475d-a813-dcae0cdfbf7b.name: Tdd
0221cb01-7c95-475d-a813-dcae0cdfbf7b.one liner: Test-Driven Development (TDD) involves writing a failing automated test to specify what is to be built. The test is then made to pass by writing code which satisfies the tested condition. Finally, the code is refactored.

fcd7c4c5-6446-4f72-a8e8-52407516a62f.name: OpenCV for Secret Agents
fcd7c4c5-6446-4f72-a8e8-52407516a62f.title: OpenCV for Secret Agents
fcd7c4c5-6446-4f72-a8e8-52407516a62f.one liner: Use OpenCV in six secret projects to augment your home, car, phone, eyesight, and any photo or drawing

29d6247c-96c8-45dd-a991-0716f7feb63a.name: Updating
29d6247c-96c8-45dd-a991-0716f7feb63a.one liner: Updating can refer to the modification of data or configuration by an application, process, or service, or can refer to the modification of software by a process.

af660c1b-5e16-4915-9198-dc7c8afc612d.name: Python Game Programming By Example
af660c1b-5e16-4915-9198-dc7c8afc612d.title: Python Game Programming By Example
af660c1b-5e16-4915-9198-dc7c8afc612d.one liner: A pragmatic guide for developing your own games with Python

33d12fa8-6b7e-41d5-b0f9-d711ae572aa0.name: Popover
33d12fa8-6b7e-41d5-b0f9-d711ae572aa0.one liner: A popover is a GUI element visually similar to a popup, except a popover is part of the page from which it is drawn, even though it might obscure part of it.

9674dddc-21c9-46d8-a380-2bb36ddbca71.name: Teamcity
9674dddc-21c9-46d8-a380-2bb36ddbca71.one liner: TeamCity from JetBrains is a continuous integration tool and a distributed Java-based build management system that can be highly beneficial to teams using an agile development approach.

25778eea-3b23-4432-90db-50626c5723a3.name: Vertica
25778eea-3b23-4432-90db-50626c5723a3.one liner: Vertica is a column-based database that runs on clusters of Linux servers. The Vertica Analytics Platform is part of HP Software's Big Data Platform called [HP Haven][1]. It is also available as a SaaS based solution called Vertica OnDemand. See the [hp-haven][2] tag for more related questions.

3a72baed-ffdb-45ec-a05d-ce76c15c242b.name: Raspberry Pi Embedded Projects Hotshot
3a72baed-ffdb-45ec-a05d-ce76c15c242b.title: Raspberry Pi Mechatronics Projects HOTSHOT
3a72baed-ffdb-45ec-a05d-ce76c15c242b.one liner: Enter the world of mechatronic systems with the Raspberry Pi to design and build 12 amazing projects

38174213-6d07-4269-9968-29524e014e9c.name: Staging
38174213-6d07-4269-9968-29524e014e9c.one liner: Staging is the process of deploying to an intermediate, usually internal, repository so that deployed artifacts can be tested and later promoted to higher levels so that they can finally be release to public repositories

2c8fef47-d23d-42f4-8790-f9e53ff34f58.name: 5 2D Game Engines you might not have considered
2c8fef47-d23d-42f4-8790-f9e53ff34f58.title: 5 2D Game Engines you might not have considered
2c8fef47-d23d-42f4-8790-f9e53ff34f58.one liner: Looking to make a Unity 2D game? Have you thought about the other engines available? It's not just Cocos2D - there's tons that may be perfect for you.

2f649591-3d29-4794-a22d-ca19890062e6.name: Functional Programming
2f649591-3d29-4794-a22d-ca19890062e6.one liner: Functional programming is a programming paradigm which primarily uses functions as means for building abstractions and expressing computations that comprise a computer program.

fa46f086-ab51-4c6e-bc90-fd2204cbf55c.name: Layout
fa46f086-ab51-4c6e-bc90-fd2204cbf55c.one liner: The layout tag is for questions about the placement, alignment and justification of objects with respect to a containing element. For questions pertaining to CSS, use the 'css' tag instead.

6e808808-884e-4593-8c8c-d3361480f128.name: Mako
6e808808-884e-4593-8c8c-d3361480f128.one liner: Mako is a template library written in Python. It provides a familiar, non-XML syntax which compiles into Python modules for maximum performance. Conceptually, Mako is an embedded Python (i.e. Python Server Page) language.

7510094b-d241-4e09-ac48-fef875bcf497.name: Django
7510094b-d241-4e09-ac48-fef875bcf497.one liner: Django is an open source web application framework, written in Python. Django is designed to reduce the effort required to create complex data-driven websites and web applications.

e189343d-ef62-4702-96dd-33e9ad0f0a17.name: Computer Science
e189343d-ef62-4702-96dd-33e9ad0f0a17.one liner: Computer science (CS) is the science behind programming. It is the study of the theoretical foundations of information and computation and of practical techniques for their implementation and application in computer systems.

cef47bef-eb2e-4b7f-a1f7-bd0ebe41b8f4.name: Using your smart watch to control networked LEDs
cef47bef-eb2e-4b7f-a1f7-bd0ebe41b8f4.title: Using your smart watch to control networked LEDs
cef47bef-eb2e-4b7f-a1f7-bd0ebe41b8f4.one liner: In this post Ill use JavaScript to show you how easy it is to build a Pebble watch application that can interact with an external service.

895a8d62-5cd9-422a-ac93-0f26ecb1b002.name: Idioms
895a8d62-5cd9-422a-ac93-0f26ecb1b002.one liner: A programming idiom is a way to overcome a programming language limitation and/or to write commonly-used code with a purpose that is separated from a literal meaning of the code. Also, an idiom is a preferred way to write code, when there is more than one obvious way to do it.

fbc804df-974b-41f1-a762-cb1b90dd158a.name: Shared Libraries
fbc804df-974b-41f1-a762-cb1b90dd158a.one liner: Shared libraries are libraries that are loaded by programs when they start. A single shared copy of each library is loaded into physical memory and may be used by multiple processes at the same time. This reduces memory use and improves system performance.

781a2e93-c0b3-4b92-853f-c71aba862a3d.name: Camera
781a2e93-c0b3-4b92-853f-c71aba862a3d.one liner: In the real world, a camera is a device that takes physical or digital photos. In the virtual world, it is used to aim at virtual objects and or move through a virtual scene.

87a81bfc-8a0c-4679-89a6-56332afea150.name: Smooth
87a81bfc-8a0c-4679-89a6-56332afea150.one liner: In statistics and image processing, to smooth a data set is to create an approximating function that attempts to capture important patterns in the data, while leaving out noise or other fine-scale structures/rapid phenomena.

1a07ae79-4e41-489a-ae1a-ebaad64d8151.name: Python Data Science Cookbook
1a07ae79-4e41-489a-ae1a-ebaad64d8151.title: Python Data Science Cookbook
1a07ae79-4e41-489a-ae1a-ebaad64d8151.one liner: Over 60 practical recipes to help you explore Python and its robust data science capabilities

72c1f81a-1e52-43c5-a5e1-e9d376f92220.name: Sikuli
72c1f81a-1e52-43c5-a5e1-e9d376f92220.one liner: Sikuli is a tool available for Linux, Windows and Mac OS X which automates tasks using images/screenshot. You take a screenshot of what you want to click, right click, hover, drag and drop and so on and Sikuli performs those actions automatically. It can be used both for Desktop and Web Application.

f54d3612-c10b-440e-a859-b4f087397669.name: Process
f54d3612-c10b-440e-a859-b4f087397669.one liner: This tag is about operating system processes. It may also refer to a specific construct on a given platform, e.g., the System.Diagnostics.Process class for .NET

b180f923-46ff-4447-ab28-c524a93ea59f.name: Specifications
b180f923-46ff-4447-ab28-c524a93ea59f.one liner: A specification (also commonly referred to as "spec") is a description of a defined technology and the resources it offers.

9053c930-9023-41d0-bdcf-964de3f7ee50.name: Cython
9053c930-9023-41d0-bdcf-964de3f7ee50.one liner: Cython is a language for quickly generating Python C extensions.

d5464cfa-ef16-4d7a-9717-e550538f6455.name: Learning Robotics using Python
d5464cfa-ef16-4d7a-9717-e550538f6455.title: Learning Robotics Using Python
d5464cfa-ef16-4d7a-9717-e550538f6455.one liner: Design, simulate, program, and prototype an interactive autonomous mobile robot from scratch with the help of Python, ROS, and Open-CV!

04f2aaad-01a2-41a4-b14b-83ff12629c69.name: Gpio

6f18c3e1-9b85-4db1-ab46-846bbb0fecc9.one liner:
IRC - Stands for Internet Relay Chat is an internet based chat protocol.
Main idea is to have users connect to a server network, where they can then send messages to each other through channels or direct chat. 
Today there's quite a few different networks, usually each with a main thematic.
Stack Overflow got its own channel on the FreeNode network. You can read more about that on the full tag wiki page.

c9ebcce6-aaea-4e2b-bd54-8afc71f79241.one liner: A buffer is an area of memory set aside for temporary storage of data while it is being moved from one place to another. This is typically done to speed up processes with significant latency, such as writing to a disk, printer or other physical device. The output is ready to be sent to the device before the device is ready to accept it, so it is moved to the buffer so that the sending program does not have to continue waiting.

Qt is a cross-platform application development framework widely used for the development of application software that can be run on various software and hardware platforms with little or no change in the underlying codebase, while having the power and speed of native applications.
Qt is available with both commercial and open source licenses.

27e8de86-c00e-4958-8d2a-aac2b9e356c2.name: Function
27e8de86-c00e-4958-8d2a-aac2b9e356c2.one liner: A function (also called a procedure, method, subroutine, or routine) is a portion of code intended to carry out a single, specific task.

a635224c-07e0-407b-841e-a6cd48f8ec19.name: Qa
a635224c-07e0-407b-841e-a6cd48f8ec19.one liner: Quality assurance, or QA for short, is the systematic monitoring and evaluation of the various aspects of a project, service or facility to maximize the probability that minimum standards of quality are being attained by the production process. QA cannot absolutely guarantee the production of quality products.

d3e0cda7-1031-4817-a63c-8cde4a1e5038.name: Music
d3e0cda7-1031-4817-a63c-8cde4a1e5038.one liner: In programming, music refers to sound that follows properties distinct from speech or noise, or the symbolic representation, manipulation, and representation (display or audio) of musical objects, or for the metadata of these objects. Related tags, such as [audio] or media] refer more generally to all sound that could be stored, streamed, or manipulated. Tags for specific music representations such as [midi] or instruments such as [guitar] also exist.

3062bdcb-c29e-4ee4-80a0-33f019c6b2b4.name: Implicit
3062bdcb-c29e-4ee4-80a0-33f019c6b2b4.one liner: An implicit in Scala is a function applied or a parameter provided without explicitly appearing in the source code.

188b3e3b-1cbb-4e26-9709-41a1d5c7d765.one liner: Refers generally to the process of moving data from an external source into one's platform, program, or data set.

f683a385-2366-4431-8a94-f08d7dfd26a2.name: Crash
f683a385-2366-4431-8a94-f08d7dfd26a2.one liner: A crash is the result of an unrecoverable error that causes the program to stop completely. During software development, crashes can be avoided by implementing proper error and exception handling.

220b5d12-a130-43c2-be70-6152a8191b3a.one liner: MPEG - Class of Compression standards and related algorithms, tools and systems

free is a function to deallocate memory obtained from malloc and other functions in C.
Do not use this tag to refer to free software. Asking for software recommendation is off-topic on Stack Overflow. If you are asking about a free piece of software, you may mention that in the question body.

da2c1efa-327e-47b4-9b53-9391b2471ee7.one liner: SymPy is an open source Python library for symbolic mathematics.

98899ac8-7cb8-4d3a-a1ed-a05cb40fbedd.one liner: Input is usually related to user input, i.e., to the data that user supplies to a running application. In many systems this input is considered to be potentially dangerous and needs to be sanitized to ensure that the user has not injected runnable code into the application.

82b8f26a-d112-4ed3-a82d-db1bdd96ad44.one liner: Anything related to function interpolation, i.e. the mathematical techniques for estimating the (unknown) value of a function in a point on the basis of a set of known values in other (usually nearby) points. For interpolation of strings, see [tag:string-interpolation].

bc0c92a7-89b5-4429-8046-02e88b3981a3.one liner:

Its purpose is to provide configuration file enforcement, service state monitoring, package installation and other server-side management.

06c0b9bb-93b8-44a0-9ebe-8c9d71bca9b0.one liner: IPv4 is the "old style" IP protocol currently used in most circumstances.

b63f39e9-203c-4569-b1d0-ee4c01babc8c.one liner: Amazon S3 (simple storage service) is an online storage service from Amazon Web Services.

c8be23dc-62e5-415f-b5c1-6cc0ca4b9f9f.one liner:
PostgreSQL is an open-source, object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) available for all major platforms including Linux, UNIX, Windows and OS X.  
Please mention your exact PostgreSQL version when asking questions.

75b64e58-0312-4205-b98d-f8764ee7e21a.name: Apache Pig
75b64e58-0312-4205-b98d-f8764ee7e21a.one liner: Apache Pig is a platform for analyzing large data sets that consists of a high-level language for expressing data analysis programs, coupled with infrastructure for evaluating these programs. The salient property of Pig programs is that their structure is amenable to substantial parallelization which enables them to handle very large data sets.

9a1b51f9-5fcd-404a-8c15-e1ecd8307963.one liner: Beautiful Soup is a Python package for parsing HTML/XML. The latest version of this package is version 4, imported as bs4.

ca31f3a0-dfc5-4cd9-8787-635a56740073.one liner: The Natural Language Toolkit is a Python library for computational linguistics.

d503fa54-4e24-45e5-8394-e763dbc97e98.one liner: Methods for displaying additional or previously hidden visual components, particularly with regard to HTML.

7095f1f2-0e03-410d-8dbb-5acb7cc43db8.name: Widget
7095f1f2-0e03-410d-8dbb-5acb7cc43db8.one liner: A widget is an element of a user interface (GUI widget) or a self-contained (usually small) software application (desktop widget).

52aa7398-489e-454e-b009-1f221bfabf6f.name: Dexterity
52aa7398-489e-454e-b009-1f221bfabf6f.one liner: Dexterity is a content type framework for CMF applications, with particular emphasis on Plone. It can be viewed as an alternative to Archetypes that is more light-weight and modular

f813b81e-853a-4803-bb21-a06e1ffcf549.name: Differential Equations
f813b81e-853a-4803-bb21-a06e1ffcf549.one liner: An equation that relates some unknown function itself and its derivatives of various orders.

ea50389a-47d1-43a0-9509-98a5fe0e1c0b.one liner: Text is a sequence of characters that is most often used to represent a cohesive piece of information.

0a2b2e8f-b1f8-4eb8-9cd4-26530c8cb0cc.one liner: Method or control to return user to previous state, page or screen.

e192467a-d9c8-4d3c-86c5-d97e5ea53e0d.one liner:
Charts are a graphical representation of data, most often in the format of a graph or diagram.

There are dozens of charting solutions available for creating charts, typically using some charting libraries (written in JavaScript or PHP) as a charting engine.

Use this tag for questions about using any of the charting solutions.

5b315bfe-f743-478b-aec7-76bc8a9d4b2f.one liner: Plone is a content management system (CMS) written in Python. Its strengths are in intranets, websites and document management. It has support for multilingual content and versioning.

4a4b20e5-efe8-41f7-882c-07297f0b2d26.name: Amazon Ec2
4a4b20e5-efe8-41f7-882c-07297f0b2d26.one liner: Amazon EC2 stands for "Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud". It is a part of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and allows users to rent virtual machine instances by the hour. You can create instances, launch and manage them through a central interface, through a web API or through a console.

7562913c-72c0-4b89-8895-4589f0b74f2b.name: Ribbon
7562913c-72c0-4b89-8895-4589f0b74f2b.one liner: A ribbon is an interface wherein a set of toolbars are organized using tabs.

5394a7a8-4c50-4069-866d-b5cbe7ec5b35.name: Sql
5394a7a8-4c50-4069-866d-b5cbe7ec5b35.one liner: Structured Query Language (SQL) is a language for querying databases. Questions should include code examples, table structure, sample data, [SQL Fiddle](http://sqlfiddle.com) and a tag for the DBMS implementation (e.g. MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, IBM DB2) being used. If your question relates to a specific DBMS (uses specific extensions/features), use that DBMS's tag instead. Answers to questions tagged with SQL should use ANSI SQL.

f8524faa-4cc1-440e-a2f8-32bffe70eed5.name: Multicore
f8524faa-4cc1-440e-a2f8-32bffe70eed5.one liner: Multicore programming covers techniques for making programs run in parallel, by exploiting hardware with multiple processing cores.

6cd1dd6a-727f-421b-abc6-6e41558952b2.one liner: The Repeater control is used to display a repeated list of items that are bound to the control.

ab08d37a-879d-42c5-b8db-1f25a74455fd.one liner: For questions related to analytics methods and tools.

1590e650-f268-4a91-8048-c0d07b0a89b1.name: Syntax
1590e650-f268-4a91-8048-c0d07b0a89b1.one liner: In computer science, the syntax of a programming language is the set of rules that define the combinations of symbols that are considered to be correctly structured programs in that language.

f677e391-5cd7-46a7-93e7-057d81d4a7bb.one liner: Questions about using PySide, a Python Qt bindings project.

127176c4-e95b-4be2-8d5f-4437b12de3ea.one liner: In pattern recognition and in image processing, feature extraction is a special form of dimensionality reduction. Transforming the input data into the set of features is called feature extraction. If the features extracted are carefully chosen it is expected that the features set will extract the relevant information from the input data in order to perform the desired task using this reduced representation instead of the full size input.

17548aa5-832a-4a83-80dd-b281df448822.one liner: Refers to the act of running a process.

289ef510-6062-4ad9-97fe-9ea5a82972d2.one liner: Bayesian refers to methods in probability and statistics named after Thomas Bayes (ca. 1702–1761), in particular methods related to statistical inference

cb35760f-2473-40e6-b9ec-1bd270f96658.one liner: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of commercial services centered around virtualized, commodity and clustered computing, networking, database and storage, as well as supporting tools that are offered through infrastructure as a service.

ffefde2b-3633-4013-8168-fccd14d37883.one liner: Volume, or loudness Loudness is the characteristic of a sound that is primarily a psychological correlate of physical strength (amplitude). More formally, it is defined as "that attribute of auditory sensation in terms of which sounds can be ordered on a scale extending from quiet to loud".

The most recent version of the protocol is TLS version 1.2, specified by the IETF in [RFC 5246](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc5246.txt).

A given datastore may provide a rich toolset for storing and retrieving data (RDBMS), or it may provide no tools (flat files).

71cb558e-7d21-4503-93a3-0c7d4a72ca8b.name: Deep
71cb558e-7d21-4503-93a3-0c7d4a72ca8b.one liner: Anything related to so-called deep operations on recursive data structures, such as trees. A deep operation traverses the entire data structure, in contrast with "shallow" operations that only affect its "first level". For example, a deep-copy operation on a directory tree would copy the entire tree instead of copying only the content of the root directory.

0b57b94b-049d-40fb-bf02-22594957eef3.name: Var
0b57b94b-049d-40fb-bf02-22594957eef3.one liner: var is a keyword in a number of programming languages.

52e76f0f-de75-4fbf-a907-83f9bbd87f04.one liner: This tag is for questions concerning problems using numbers which either cannot be exactly solved, or where the exact solution may be much more difficult to acquire than by using numerical methods.

102c77d1-a4af-47c7-a9af-54e34e55952a.name: Concurrency
102c77d1-a4af-47c7-a9af-54e34e55952a.one liner: In computer science, concurrency is a property of systems in which multiple computations can be performed in overlapping time periods. The computations may be executing on multiple cores in the same chip, preemptively time-shared threads on the same processor, or executed on physically separated processors.

4014b922-47ec-4287-86b8-45caa25601cb.name: Classification
4014b922-47ec-4287-86b8-45caa25601cb.one liner: In machine learning and statistics, classification is the problem of identifying which of a set of categories a new observation belongs to, on the basis of a training set of data containing observations whose category membership is known.

238d461d-f483-4ed7-9acd-aeeab3023160.name: Npm
238d461d-f483-4ed7-9acd-aeeab3023160.one liner: NPM is the official package manager for Node.js, the non-blocking, asynchronous I/O framework that uses Google's V8 JavaScript engine. It can be used to install and publish CommonJS modules and JavaScript-based CLI programs.

f1ba4e55-0bcb-4d83-95c7-33eb4af5b2a8.name: News
f1ba4e55-0bcb-4d83-95c7-33eb4af5b2a8.one liner:
News is the communication of selected information on current events. 
It is shared in various ways: among individuals and small groups (such as by word of mouth or newsletters); with wider audiences (such as by publishing, either in print or online, or broadcasting, such as on television or radio); or in ways that blend those traits (such as when social media sharing starts among individuals but goes viral).

59cee2dd-ecac-4b0c-9b7d-bb4d5c53fd2e.name: Distributed
59cee2dd-ecac-4b0c-9b7d-bb4d5c53fd2e.one liner: is for questions dealing with distributed systems, programs and programming.

0b15b6c5-323d-4123-99fe-891ea164cf04.name: Replication
0b15b6c5-323d-4123-99fe-891ea164cf04.one liner: The use of redundant resources to improve reliability, fault-tolerance, or performance.

5f04c5d0-dc0e-4022-bf87-e36abe47c9e2.one liner: make chosen words or phrases more visually prominent

e9ff14c5-8894-4874-a6e0-99d026eda4b1.name: Logging
e9ff14c5-8894-4874-a6e0-99d026eda4b1.one liner: Computer data logging is the process of recording events in a computer program, usually with a certain scope, in order to provide an audit trail that can be used to understand the activity of the system and to diagnose problems.

b7df0817-7762-462d-b205-0ef2841c1fcf.one liner: A simple definition of temperature is that it is a measure of heat dissipation, This tag can include programming related questions like temperature conversion, temperature detection through device sensors etc.

13cc6312-a973-4fce-84db-3db28f1592c1.one liner: Middleware is computer software that provides services to software applications beyond those available from the operating system. It can be described as "software glue".

5991a903-6f4a-4543-a1ec-fca5a6ea569f.name: Modeling
5991a903-6f4a-4543-a1ec-fca5a6ea569f.one liner: Modeling is the constructing and manipulating abstract (mathematical and/or graphical) representations of economic, engineering, manufacturing, social, and other types of situations and natural phenomenon, simulated with the help of a computer system.

b8f273c2-16aa-4ecf-8a22-6bfb1ae77d7e.name: Raster
b8f273c2-16aa-4ecf-8a22-6bfb1ae77d7e.one liner:
A rectangular array of pixels.
A Raster defines values for pixels occupying a particular rectangular area of the plane, not necessarily including (0, 0).

6f43d5f7-080a-4159-95fa-62158bd8b8e0.name: Device
6f43d5f7-080a-4159-95fa-62158bd8b8e0.one liner: Electronic devices: computers, smartphones, tablets, electronic hardware and platforms.

abd40a2b-233d-4052-b0b7-4dbf1a59b2af.name: Lxc
abd40a2b-233d-4052-b0b7-4dbf1a59b2af.one liner: LXC is an operating system-level virtualization method for running multiple isolated Linux systems (containers) on a single control host. It is sometimes referred to as “chroot on steroids”.

f439a529-9534-4e14-afa4-bb3e6dacb4d7.name: Viewport
f439a529-9534-4e14-afa4-bb3e6dacb4d7.one liner: A viewport is a rectangular viewing region in computer graphics, or a term used for optical components. It has several definitions in different contexts.A viewport is a region of the screen used to display a portion of the total image to be shown. Also it can be a group of regions that together make  one layout.

e71a0655-c9c7-4289-8a06-2dbe53887af9.name: Encoding
e71a0655-c9c7-4289-8a06-2dbe53887af9.one liner: Encoding is a set of predefined rules to reversibly transform a piece of information in a certain representation into a completely different representation. The other way round is called decoding.

b53a4317-4b7b-4127-9611-1fd921423650.one liner: A web browser or Internet browser is a software application for retrieving, presenting, and traversing information resources on the World Wide Web.

60f9cc03-5b63-4c6b-b4d5-d0ec13c11c83.name: Zookeeper
60f9cc03-5b63-4c6b-b4d5-d0ec13c11c83.one liner: Apache ZooKeeper is a distributed service that provides configuration information storage, naming, synchronization, coordination, and group services.

e1c2943f-6c3d-46ae-9d5a-58068c7f6635.one liner: A graphical technique for presenting a data set or an equation.

695bdefa-a259-4bf1-a92d-17571e782277.one liner: sh, aka Bourne Shell, is the Unix Shell, the standard shell since v7 Unix.  POSIX has standardized the shell, and portable shell scripts should conform to /bin/sh syntax.

6c9ed77e-0772-41af-a806-26abb31e37e8.one liner: Logistic regression is a statistical classification model used for making categorical predictions.

15e10ed8-9dd0-4d1c-8b76-ff0fd1879b75.title: Mastering Sublime Text

e4edc1d4-bd13-4a49-acb0-dcaaabdeddc7.name: Kubernetes
e4edc1d4-bd13-4a49-acb0-dcaaabdeddc7.one liner: Kubernetes is an open source implementation of container cluster management.

fe4ac72c-a3e0-44a1-8c7b-c4fbdbcbd208.name: Aptana Studio Beginner's Guide
fe4ac72c-a3e0-44a1-8c7b-c4fbdbcbd208.title: Aptana Studio Beginner's Guide

10bdb16c-171d-4dac-b38c-3dbfda8e619f.name: Generator
10bdb16c-171d-4dac-b38c-3dbfda8e619f.one liner: A generator is a generalisation of a subroutine, primarily used to simplify the writing of iterators. The yield statement in a generator does not specify a coroutine to jump to, but rather passes a value back to a parent routine.

f8ef1481-0934-4a04-be72-007029d7e6bb.name: Continuous
f8ef1481-0934-4a04-be72-007029d7e6bb.one liner: A random variable X is called continuous if its set of possible values is uncountable, and the chance that it takes any particular value is zero (P(X=x)=0 for every real number x). A random variable is continuous if and only if its cumulative probability distribution function is a continuous function.

33f4e346-3169-4528-a8d7-52601100a235.name: Sudo
33f4e346-3169-4528-a8d7-52601100a235.one liner: The sudo command is an abbreviation for "substitute user do" (as in, do a command as if started by another user). Sudo is a program for Unix and Unix-like computer operating systems that allows a user to run programs with the security privileges of another user (normally the superuser, or root).

6500e07d-f2f1-4b70-b944-5cbcf495cbea.name: Webmin
6500e07d-f2f1-4b70-b944-5cbcf495cbea.one liner: A web-based interface for system administration for Unix. Setup user accounts, DNS, file sharing and the program is freeware.

1dbe351c-a2fa-48ed-86f4-a9693e8ebe3f.name: Telnet
1dbe351c-a2fa-48ed-86f4-a9693e8ebe3f.one liner: Telnet is an old protocol for bidirectional interactive text-oriented communication with remote hosts via virtual terminals. It is defined in rfc854. On modern UNIX-like systems it is replaced with more secure and flexible SSH protocol.

58b90465-1e4f-4bc8-af5b-3d3878980962.name: If Statement
58b90465-1e4f-4bc8-af5b-3d3878980962.one liner: An "if" statement is a control structure in many programming languages that changes the execution flow depending on a condition.

c99ba190-95f4-4606-9716-9f7c8eacdf6d.name: Computation
c99ba190-95f4-4606-9716-9f7c8eacdf6d.one liner: Computation is paramount to the discipline of computer science, and deals with the type and use of computing technology in information processing, in particular, in the context of an algorithm, or a protocol.

79c1e918-795e-406d-aacb-ebe7c48078e6.name: Testing
79c1e918-795e-406d-aacb-ebe7c48078e6.one liner: Software testing is any activity aimed at evaluating an attribute or capability of a program or system and determining that it meets its required results.

9cfebf8b-7df4-4f0f-933c-044b4f2bc0b8.name: Textures
9cfebf8b-7df4-4f0f-933c-044b4f2bc0b8.one liner: Textures are series of images used in computer graphics to associate locations on a visible surface with varying values. This association is typically done by mapping locations on the texture (usually two-dimensional, but other dimensions and types of textures exist) to locations on the rendered surface. Filtering is often used to smooth away aliasing when sampling values from the texture, usually involving multiple images within a texture called mipmaps.

cfee9f67-7a24-4b3b-955c-b8de3c4fbca5.name: C
cfee9f67-7a24-4b3b-955c-b8de3c4fbca5.one liner: C is a general-purpose computer programming language used for operating systems, libraries, games and other high performance work. It is clearly distinct from C++. It was developed in 1972 by Dennis Ritchie for use with the Unix operating system.

b7fa4fa7-56b0-4041-b04e-7aa7c2387977.name: Raspberry Pi
b7fa4fa7-56b0-4041-b04e-7aa7c2387977.one liner: The Raspberry Pi is a low cost, credit card sized, ARMv6 instruction set based PC device developed by the Raspberry Pi foundation.

23f18c0e-6d41-481b-a644-d1c9ac76da20.name: JavaScript and JSON Essentials
23f18c0e-6d41-481b-a644-d1c9ac76da20.title: JavaScript and JSON Essentials
23f18c0e-6d41-481b-a644-d1c9ac76da20.one liner: If you fancy a less verbose data format than CSV or XML, then JSON could be for you. This tutorial will teach you about using JSON with JavaScript for effective local storage or Internet transfers.

6d99f54c-1874-4469-91bf-22d048ec0e4b.name: Robot
6d99f54c-1874-4469-91bf-22d048ec0e4b.one liner: Questions related to physical robots in general should use this tag. For other topics, please use one of the more specific tags listed in the wiki of this tag, if appropriate. You may also consider asking your question on robotics stack exchange: http://robotics.stackexchange.com/.

b74c6fe0-19cb-4055-a700-15a08a8369f7.name: Speech
b74c6fe0-19cb-4055-a700-15a08a8369f7.one liner: Speech is the vocalized form of human communication.

ed0412f3-123d-4d18-8f4a-2a5c9ceb8d86.name: Debian
ed0412f3-123d-4d18-8f4a-2a5c9ceb8d86.one liner: Debian is a universal operating system composed of over 29000 free and open-source software packages. The primary form of Debian, Debian GNU/Linux, uses the Linux kernel and GNU OS tools.

cc93f612-9deb-4ad8-a113-edaafdb30296.name: Python Parallel Programming Cookbook
cc93f612-9deb-4ad8-a113-edaafdb30296.title: Python Parallel Programming Cookbook

6485f102-bdd3-4bd1-875a-962554c80778.name: Weather
6485f102-bdd3-4bd1-875a-962554c80778.one liner: For questions about scientific computing involving weather analysis and/or simulations. Any weather questions on this site should be programming-related.

63ba079e-0147-4171-8f36-dc4282a6fef0.name: Cygwin
63ba079e-0147-4171-8f36-dc4282a6fef0.one liner: Cygwin is a Unix-like environment and command-line interface for Microsoft Windows. Cygwin provides native integration of Windows-based applications, data, and other system resources with applications, software tools, and data of the Unix-like environment. Thus it is possible to launch Windows applications from the Cygwin environment, as well as to use Cygwin tools and applications within the Windows operating context.

ab1d0280-2efd-4b53-a956-d79182271ea1.name: Python Data Visualization Cookbook
ab1d0280-2efd-4b53-a956-d79182271ea1.title: Python Data Visualization Cookbook
ab1d0280-2efd-4b53-a956-d79182271ea1.one liner: As a developer with knowledge of Python you are already in a great position to start using data visualization. This superb cookbook shows you how in plain language and practical recipes, culminating with 3D animations.

410c07f7-d814-4f6e-a6a8-c346cd40bfd4.name: Concept
410c07f7-d814-4f6e-a6a8-c346cd40bfd4.one liner: Concept programming is a programming paradigm focusing on how concepts, that live in the programmer's head, translate into representations that are found in the code space. This approach was introduced in 2001 by Christophe de Dinechin with the XL Programming Language.

497cc5e8-d526-4db8-8ee9-3dc84f31a7ac.name: FreeCAD

22ac6954-2122-4a6d-a0db-f9d81ff49e79.one liner: To convert some encoded data (e.g. bytes, electrical signals) to some representation ready for further processing (e.g. string, object, picture)

127d146b-8a08-45a4-83b8-36a36f3056fc.one liner: DO NOT USE THIS TAG. It is under an active cleanup: http://meta.stackoverflow.com/q/305314 Use [web-scraping] if your question is about scraping information from web resources (there is also [screen-scraping]) or use [pdf-scraping] if your question is about scraping information from pdf files. e11b2cb6-e752-4189-bf33-73c2e22634c1.name: Bulk
e11b2cb6-e752-4189-bf33-73c2e22634c1.one liner: The meaning of bulk is the major portion or greater part of any size, mass, or volume.

281c0b80-c6a8-4fd0-b095-242f9cb90dfa.name: Multiprocessing
281c0b80-c6a8-4fd0-b095-242f9cb90dfa.one liner: Multiprocessing is the use of two or more central processing units (CPUs) within a single computer system

7e01898c-47a6-4d02-bda6-421d486d034f.name: Prepare
7e01898c-47a6-4d02-bda6-421d486d034f.one liner: A prepared statement is used to execute the same SQL statement repeatedly with high efficiency.

86b2c90c-904c-4973-b39e-1d516f6a4434.name: Equals
86b2c90c-904c-4973-b39e-1d516f6a4434.one liner: Refers to Java equals method, indicating whether some object is "equal to" this one.

e55a217b-e507-47f7-b23f-827f826c11c9.name: Zope
e55a217b-e507-47f7-b23f-827f826c11c9.one liner: Zope is an open source application server written in the Python programming language. It features a transactional object database (ZODB) which can store not only content and custom data, but also dynamic HTML templates, scripts, a search engine, and relational database (RDBMS) connections and code. It features a strong through-the-web development model, allowing you to update your web site from anywhere made possible by a tightly integrated security model.

ebd3959b-979b-4cd3-a9b7-e95f6ff36dab.name: Panda3D 1.7 Game Developer's Cookbook

ee28b26a-f649-499f-bd87-4b48e71054e9.name: Open Source
ee28b26a-f649-499f-bd87-4b48e71054e9.one liner: Open source software is software distributed under an open source license. Such a license specifically allows anyone to copy, modify, extend and redistribute the source code without paying royalties or fees to the original authors. Only use this tag if your question relates to these issues in some way; it shouldn't be simply "this question is for an open source project."

8ddcd1d8-9127-4e8a-aaba-cebc122de185.name: Build
8ddcd1d8-9127-4e8a-aaba-cebc122de185.one liner: The process of converting source code files into standalone software artifact(s) that can be run on a computer

04c7405e-56d2-4b26-a863-b71356be4600.name: Dialog
04c7405e-56d2-4b26-a863-b71356be4600.one liner: A form (window, box, etc.) presented to a user, usually for the purpose of capturing input or to make a decision.

6b0f8a30-8760-433d-9866-6da6cf2d1a61.name: Layer
6b0f8a30-8760-433d-9866-6da6cf2d1a61.one liner: This tag is ambiguous. Consider using more specific tags to better reflect the question's content.

a10ba875-066c-4497-b097-89f2d03d2afe.name: Lua
a10ba875-066c-4497-b097-89f2d03d2afe.one liner: Lua is a powerful, fast, lightweight, embeddable scripting language. It's dynamically typed, runs by interpreting bytecode and has automatic garbage collection. It is often referred to as an "extensible extension language".

8d608a2f-c40c-442a-8180-6d15d908e6dd.name: Interactive
8d608a2f-c40c-442a-8180-6d15d908e6dd.one liner: Interactive software accepts and responds to input from humans, in contrast to noninteractive software, which operate without human contact.

9c72c85f-a19b-4383-89b4-76c40bc9c583.one liner:
This tag is used for topics relating to application security and attacks against software.
If your question is not about a specific programming problem, please consider instead asking it at Security.SE: http://security.stackexchange.com

26370fa9-3752-4f8a-889e-5c11fd413f6d.name: Scalability
26370fa9-3752-4f8a-889e-5c11fd413f6d.one liner: Scalability is the ability of a system, network, or process, to handle growing amount of work in a capable manner or its ability to be enlarged to accommodate that growth.

032acf86-6b7d-4cd9-a526-10ba5941d170.name: Children
032acf86-6b7d-4cd9-a526-10ba5941d170.one liner: Children is the set of all nodes within a hierarchical data structure which have a node above them.

d066fa42-ede0-4c75-8acc-5737a063eba2.one liner: PyCharm is an integrated development environment (IDE) for Python. It is developed by JetBrains for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.

a81d779f-5acb-41d8-bdbc-41f7b242c050.name: Slice
a81d779f-5acb-41d8-bdbc-41f7b242c050.one liner:
A slice is a representation of a part of a sequence, usually defined by a reference to the underlying sequence, an index giving the starting position, a length or end position, and optionally a "stride" or "step" value.

Please use [tag:object-slicing] for the slicing problem in C++ and [tag:program-slicing] for the analysis technique.

08f404b6-25f3-47e8-aea2-fe0f6c4812c9.name: Gestures
08f404b6-25f3-47e8-aea2-fe0f6c4812c9.one liner: The tag refers to a method of interaction with graphical user interface. Instead of simply choosing, user may draw a shape (so called gesture) over an item, which is recognized by the software and triggers specific reaction. Gestures are very popular, but not limited to touchscreen applications.

65402f85-7c08-4c30-a4c3-c2ab77103f61.name: Ls
65402f85-7c08-4c30-a4c3-c2ab77103f61.one liner: A utility in Unix-like systems such as Linux used for listing files and directories.

f5df437e-ba06-4b3f-a196-1434b128e8c7.one liner: For questions about the Python module named sys. This tag is also used for questions relating to the Sys namespace - the root namespace for the Microsoft AJAX Library, which contains all fundamental classes and base classes.

08e9a830-a1df-4fbd-8be7-33c1ecfe3eb3.one liner: Use this tag for questions about using computers in science. Many of these questions also fit on scicomp.stackexchange.com.

50989e26-580d-47fe-b0bc-b70199aa282e.one liner: Watch refers to observing the status of variables, files or directories for some or all possible actions such as additions, deletions or modifications.

065e60ff-8562-449d-9971-1b133eae58af.name: Robotics
065e60ff-8562-449d-9971-1b133eae58af.one liner: Robotics is the branch of technology that deals with the design, construction, operation, structural disposition, manufacture and application of robots. Robotics is related to the sciences of electronics, engineering, mechanics, and software.  You may also consider asking your question on [*robotics* stack exchange](http://robotics.stackexchange.com/).

ea427474-33e0-47d9-8c14-b803c471fad8.name: Ethernet
ea427474-33e0-47d9-8c14-b803c471fad8.one liner: Ethernet is a set of networking technologies widely used to interconnect computers.

5892c056-7747-4fc3-ad8a-153996fe79bd.name: Url
5892c056-7747-4fc3-ad8a-153996fe79bd.one liner: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that specifies where an identified resource is available and the mechanism for retrieving it.

43102e16-ad85-4a5e-b3ac-a7be6fca6091.one liner: Erlang is a general-purpose, garbage-collected programming language and runtime environment, with built-in support for concurrency, distribution and fault tolerance.

92e8512e-2cc1-440c-8f77-7dc47f966b30.one liner: Embedded refers to embedded systems, which involves areas such as microcontroller/DSP firmware programming, real-time systems, electronic interfaces, hardware drivers, serial bus communication etc.

b53870b3-5074-4efc-aedc-7bc34f7b680f.one liner: Abstraction is a computer science concept in which an implementation is separated from its interface.

8de936e2-1ba4-46e4-8d73-dd04058169a2.one liner: π (pi) is a mathematical constant whose value is the ratio of any Euclidean plane circle's circumference to its diameter; this is the same value as the ratio of a circle's area to the square of its radius. It is approximately equal to 3.14159265 in decimal notation. For Raspberry Pi, please tag with "raspberry-pi".

8cebf4fd-ed23-4750-a293-a89e19773cb6.name: Category
8cebf4fd-ed23-4750-a293-a89e19773cb6.one liner: A category is a grouping of information.

b73550c3-9664-453e-a19d-65d42f5bd528.name: Puppet

b73550c3-9664-453e-a19d-65d42f5bd528.one liner: An open-source server automation tool that allows you to automate your IT infrastructure

00f5372a-c980-44b8-99d3-878a3261e03e.name: User
00f5372a-c980-44b8-99d3-878a3261e03e.one liner: A user is an agent, either a human agent (end-user) or software agent, who uses a computer or network service.

9fc3a831-f88b-400e-b688-15df99c4dbf6.name: Init
9fc3a831-f88b-400e-b688-15df99c4dbf6.one liner: May refer to Linux Init - the parent of all processes, which primary role is to create processes from a script stored in the file /etc/inittab. Or abbreviation of initialization - giving variables a "starting" value.

0fa43794-cbe1-442f-86fb-f6a85023e343.name: Task
0fa43794-cbe1-442f-86fb-f6a85023e343.one liner:
A task is an abstraction that is used to work with concurrency, it can denote operation that should be executed concurrently with the rest of a program.
A task is a concurrent thread of execution in Ada and represents an asynchronous operation in .NET, also it corresponds to Threads in Java.

326c7c62-3e6f-46c5-9ae6-d18a165299e4.name: Class
326c7c62-3e6f-46c5-9ae6-d18a165299e4.one liner: A template for creating new objects that describes the common state(s) and behavior(s). NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH CSS CLASSES. Use [css] instead.

ca7a05e1-2515-4e0f-b747-5f6cf9b0dabb.name: Strip
ca7a05e1-2515-4e0f-b747-5f6cf9b0dabb.one liner: "strip" refers to the process of removing (stripping) certain characters from a string.  A common example is removing trailing whitespace characters.

2511b9e8-3c54-4556-b51f-5ff91299ec30.name: Primitive
2511b9e8-3c54-4556-b51f-5ff91299ec30.one liner: A  primitive type is a data type provided by a programming language as a basic building block.

f5e6d652-6fc9-4f17-b8fd-cab875b201b4.one liner: Questions about search algorithm mechanics and implementation.  *NOT* for questions about using search tools within an API (e.g. Google, Bing, Facebook).

b43ab6fc-5078-4568-b761-21eb1b1e0f3b.name: Revision
b43ab6fc-5078-4568-b761-21eb1b1e0f3b.one liner:
Revision: A release of a piece of software which is not
a major release or a bugfix, but only introduces small
changes or new features.

92ee66a7-286f-4709-8c2d-c4dfc2530756.name: Scene
92ee66a7-286f-4709-8c2d-c4dfc2530756.one liner: 'scene' can refer to various things. Please combine this tag with other tags to put your question into perspective.

a3232353-1a26-4ed5-a062-d1b90bd1ad52.name: Character
a3232353-1a26-4ed5-a062-d1b90bd1ad52.one liner: Refers to a symbol that represents a letter or number. Also, the bit pattern used to represent such a symbol.

489d4a0e-30c6-4c70-8165-7b2ea8726529.name: Inheritance
489d4a0e-30c6-4c70-8165-7b2ea8726529.one liner: Inheritance is the system in object oriented programming that allows objects to support operations defined by anterior types without having to provide their own definition. It is the major vector for polymorphism in object-oriented programming.

6d75a10c-05d7-4094-a90d-efad6de1dc99.name: Forwarding
6d75a10c-05d7-4094-a90d-efad6de1dc99.one liner:
Port forwarding or port mapping is a name given to the combined technique of

*    translating the address or port number of a packet to a new destination
*    possibly accepting such packet(s) in a packet filter (firewall)
*    forwarding the packet according to the routing table.

5711cf5e-9bca-420f-9a76-a02890f4a424.name: Mastering Apache Cassandra
5711cf5e-9bca-420f-9a76-a02890f4a424.title: Mastering Apache Cassandra
5711cf5e-9bca-420f-9a76-a02890f4a424.one liner: Learn how to build more robust, scalable databases using Cassandra. From beginners to intermediates, this practical guide covers all the bases to help you get the most out of your infrastructure and using the full potential of Cassandra.

d392e9d0-90a6-4ac5-818d-091b282671a8.name: Interface
d392e9d0-90a6-4ac5-818d-091b282671a8.one liner:
An interface refers to the point of interaction between components. Interfaces are applicable at both the hardware and software level. 

In general, an interface exposes a contract without exposing the underlying implementation details. In Object Oriented Programming, interfaces define abstract types that expose behavior, but contain no logic. Implementation is defined by the class or type that implements the interface.

f02c2dad-e4df-4655-b3c2-ba1c681ca687.name: Sqlalchemy
f02c2dad-e4df-4655-b3c2-ba1c681ca687.one liner: SQLAlchemy is a Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper that gives application developers the full power and flexibility of SQL.

7c63cd0a-a61d-4298-b1a4-88b8647a4772.name: Np
7c63cd0a-a61d-4298-b1a4-88b8647a4772.one liner: NP ("nondeterministic polynomial") is a complexity class of decision problems that can be solved by a nondeterministic Turing machine in polynomial time.  Equivalently, it is the set of decision problems for which an answer can be verified in polynomial time by a deterministic Turing machine.

2b1cdfe5-8939-4519-b160-45093125790c.name: Bioinformatics with Python Cookbook
2b1cdfe5-8939-4519-b160-45093125790c.title: Bioinformatics with Python Cookbook
2b1cdfe5-8939-4519-b160-45093125790c.one liner: Learn how to use modern Python bioinformatics libraries and applications to do cutting-edge research in computational biology

fe692f2f-bcbe-4661-bea1-c46f1861799f.name: Def
fe692f2f-bcbe-4661-bea1-c46f1861799f.one liner: Def is a keyword for defining functions in Python.  Questions asked under this should be about a code using the def command or the def command in general.

29e6f2be-1d5b-48cb-8826-ee6823716763.name: Doctest
29e6f2be-1d5b-48cb-8826-ee6823716763.one liner: The doctest module searches for pieces of text that look like interactive Python sessions, and then executes those sessions to verify that they work exactly as shown. The test cases and expected output can be copied from an interactive Python interpreter session. During regression testing doctest alerts about failed cases.

1ce8cf94-57b5-425c-9450-dc82273ff8a6.name: Multimedia
1ce8cf94-57b5-425c-9450-dc82273ff8a6.one liner: Multimedia refers to content that uses a combination of different content forms.

b29422fc-63a7-40c9-9634-11c029636762.one liner: Eventual consistency is a consistency model used in distributed computing that informally guarantees that, if no new updates are made to a given data item, eventually all accesses to that item will return the last updated value.

9e6d6f51-87ac-4047-967d-05b23398811f.one liner: Remote Procedure Call (RPC) is an approach to interprocessor or distributed communication wherein a set of services or procedures are exposed to remote clients.  RPC is both a general concept for interprocessor communication and shorthand for Sun's original implementation (referred to as SunRPC to disambiguate.)

a933924b-2471-4873-86b5-26b2f942cb27.name: Mongodb
a933924b-2471-4873-86b5-26b2f942cb27.one liner: MongoDB is a scalable, high-performance, open source, document-oriented database.  It supports a large number of languages and application development platforms. Questions about server administration can be asked on http://dba.stackexchange.com.

efa9bdfc-4a70-4288-b7f1-764c4ebaa8b1.name: Sml
efa9bdfc-4a70-4288-b7f1-764c4ebaa8b1.one liner: Standard ML is a high-level functional language with type inference.

52a251d6-8b05-47aa-91bf-0dd6fe967c97.name: Average
52a251d6-8b05-47aa-91bf-0dd6fe967c97.one liner: In mathematics, an average is a measure of the "middle" or "typical" value of a data set. Different types of averages include the arithmetic mean, the median, and the mode.

cb82642f-d05c-41aa-bba9-d1f210523bcb.name: Strategy Pattern
cb82642f-d05c-41aa-bba9-d1f210523bcb.one liner: The strategy pattern (also known as the policy pattern) is a software design pattern, whereby an algorithm's behavior can be selected at runtime.

d5bd527b-1cd3-4f82-8260-11d448f01658.one liner: Configuration is the process of specifying the settings used for a system or application

29202d68-7f3c-49bb-9d57-cebdcfd26599.name: Libraries
29202d68-7f3c-49bb-9d57-cebdcfd26599.one liner: Use this tag for questions about software libraries. This tag is NOT for questions about computer programs used in public lending libraries or other brick-and-mortar libraries.

7509d9a6-02f8-4229-9bf5-539184229dfe.name: Disk
7509d9a6-02f8-4229-9bf5-539184229dfe.one liner: Anything related to disk-like storage media, like hard-disks, CDs, DVDs, etc. By extension it could be applied to other mass storage media that are commonly referred as "disks", like SSD, flash cards, etc.

a79e64ae-a667-464f-9370-0cf936656602.name: Documentation
a79e64ae-a667-464f-9370-0cf936656602.one liner: Documentation is information on aspects of software or hardware, including its intended purpose, functionality, and maintenance. Documentation can exist in many different forms and formats, but its aim is always to educate.

55e83b08-6654-40de-a108-e5432724613a.name: Roles
55e83b08-6654-40de-a108-e5432724613a.one liner: In various access control systems, roles define a group of users and organize permissions into a more manageable structure.

f839b6bd-f737-47ec-a3dd-6048f8f96539.name: Account
f839b6bd-f737-47ec-a3dd-6048f8f96539.one liner: Account allows a user to authenticate (does not imply authorization) to system services and be granted authorization to access them;. To log into an account, a user is typically required to authenticate oneself with a password or other credentials for the purposes of accounting, security, logging, and resource management.

2c4f841e-fa81-45e0-94a4-d37f81e6d69a.name: Less
2c4f841e-fa81-45e0-94a4-d37f81e6d69a.one liner: Less is an open-source stylesheet preprocessor that extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations and functions. It's also a unix command to display a file.

f1b8ae84-8507-4e30-ab34-ce77a11522c4.name: Set

It makes your applications perform better, be more responsive, and use the resources of the system they are running on to the fullest extent.
