c5e42504-eabb-447e-a86e-bad8526d7a82.name: Html
c5e42504-eabb-447e-a86e-bad8526d7a82.one liner: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language used for structuring web pages and formatting content. HTML describes the structure of a website semantically along with cues for presentation, making it a markup language, rather than a programming language. The most recent revision to the HTML specification is HTML5.

236c4598-1095-4a17-82ed-00a628b0d266.name: Return
236c4598-1095-4a17-82ed-00a628b0d266.one liner: A return statement causes execution to leave the current subroutine and resume at the point in the code immediately after where the subroutine was called, known as its return address. The return address is saved, usually on the process's call stack, as part of the operation of making the subroutine call. Some programming languages allow a function to specify a return value to be passed back to the code that called the function.

83427832-46da-4944-9e97-e37f178ba10f.name: Trading
83427832-46da-4944-9e97-e37f178ba10f.one liner: The act of buying and selling financial instruments such as stocks, bonds, commodities and derivatives.

7bf59c3b-d150-45c1-b681-f08d3252b167.name: Cocos2D Iphone
7bf59c3b-d150-45c1-b681-f08d3252b167.one liner: Objective-C version for iOS & OS X of Cocos2d. Cocos2d is a framework for building 2D games and graphical applications.

7d25be2d-a9a7-4f7e-9456-2cc974e0f5c6.name: Yaml
7d25be2d-a9a7-4f7e-9456-2cc974e0f5c6.one liner:
YAML is a data serialization format designed for human readability. YAML is a recursive acronym for "YAML Ain't Markup Language".
YAML is similar to JSON, and in fact, JSON is a subset of YAML 1.2; but YAML has some more advanced features and is easier to read. 
Use this tag for YAML specific questions only, not for questions about programs that happen to have their configuration in a YAML format (use just their specific tags e.g.: jekyll, travis-cl).

9e8ff843-1746-44be-a372-42274d7850e8.name: Generics
9e8ff843-1746-44be-a372-42274d7850e8.one liner: Generics are a form of parametric polymorphism found in a range of languages, including .NET languages, Java and in Swift.

81abfb3c-bc15-4b70-8756-1184b7ae58d5.name: Frontend
81abfb3c-bc15-4b70-8756-1184b7ae58d5.one liner: The user-facing part of an application. In a desktop application this would include the windowing framework and the forms the user interacts with; in a command line program it would be the available commands and arguments; and in a web app it would refer to the HTML and JavaScript.

ce98278f-5078-47b1-b5ee-507801886b26.name: Project
ce98278f-5078-47b1-b5ee-507801886b26.one liner: Microsoft Project questions use the tag [ms-project].  In software development, a project is a collection of files and resources used in the development of an application or service.

2d7bbd5b-6a61-4af7-8888-7788439776af.name: Python 3 Web Development Beginner's Guide
2d7bbd5b-6a61-4af7-8888-7788439776af.title: Python 3 Web Development Beginner's Guide
2d7bbd5b-6a61-4af7-8888-7788439776af.one liner: Use Python to create, theme, and deploy unique web applications

e14d73de-80ab-4114-8cc5-b7c25777211f.name: Debugging
e14d73de-80ab-4114-8cc5-b7c25777211f.one liner: Debugging is a methodical process of finding and reducing the number of bugs, or defects, in a computer program.

f233097f-2bcf-4c59-84fa-8df51d341df4.name: Dos
f233097f-2bcf-4c59-84fa-8df51d341df4.one liner: DOS is a family of operating systems for IBM PC compatibles of the 1980s and 1990s, including MS-DOS which was then displaced by Windows. Do NOT use this tag for questions concerning the Windows command line. For Windows batch files and command line, use the tags [windows], [batch-file] or [cmd]. For DoS as in denial of service, use [denial-of-service].

0528df12-68f3-4d59-af92-7e4fed0c4860.name: Config
0528df12-68f3-4d59-af92-7e4fed0c4860.one liner: Config files configure the initial settings for some computer programs

06893d68-1462-4d65-8795-67ed210a579d.name: Jobs
06893d68-1462-4d65-8795-67ed210a579d.one liner:
A job is a process executing in the background, or scheduled for later execution.  

**DO NOT** use this tag for career, employment, or hiring practice questions, as these are off-topic!

4c432939-fdb3-4f5e-840a-2ae0dd3a4ab3.name: Mvvm
4c432939-fdb3-4f5e-840a-2ae0dd3a4ab3.one liner: Model View ViewModel (MVVM) is an architectural design pattern for implementing user interfaces that separates the page (the View) from data (the Model) by way of its presentation logic (its ViewModel).

deb1e498-680b-4e70-964a-5ee3106621c3.name: Friend
deb1e498-680b-4e70-964a-5ee3106621c3.one liner: In object-oriented programming, friend refers to a method or class that has access to some non-public aspects of a particular class.

22843a58-4c9e-42d4-9208-bbd449bd9d7b.name: Trap
22843a58-4c9e-42d4-9208-bbd449bd9d7b.one liner: TRAP is an instruction command in the LC-3 assembly language that consists of a set of basic service routines to simplify operations.

f61ab53f-f0be-4f14-8beb-f5a64368b4e5.name: Web
f61ab53f-f0be-4f14-8beb-f5a64368b4e5.one liner: Use this tag for general questions related to all aspects of the world wide web. For specific portions, use the specific tag for it, such as [uri], [websites], [html] and [http].

8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.name: New Languages: Brave New World
8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.title: New Languages: Brave New World
8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.one liner: The tech world has seen a number of languages emerge, grow, and become super popular, but equally it has seen its fair share of failures and things that make you ask yourself just why?

36ebcf7a-a33a-42cb-a7dc-e9a4a932189b.name: Python for Secret Agents
36ebcf7a-a33a-42cb-a7dc-e9a4a932189b.title: Python for Secret Agents
36ebcf7a-a33a-42cb-a7dc-e9a4a932189b.one liner: Analyze, encrypt, and uncover intelligence data using Python, the essential tool for all aspiring secret agents

46097bd7-3fbe-4a55-aae8-3f55b7aeb2a3.name: Simulation
46097bd7-3fbe-4a55-aae8-3f55b7aeb2a3.one liner: Simulation is the imitation of some real thing, state of affairs, or process. The act of simulating something generally entails representing certain key characteristics or behaviours of a selected physical or abstract system.

9d472052-79b9-405e-91de-1bd26786a629.name: Pygame
9d472052-79b9-405e-91de-1bd26786a629.one liner:
Pygame is a set of Python modules designed for writing video games. 

Use this tag only if you are using the pygame library and not if you have a question about programming a game in python in general.

db9fdd1d-4a54-4bfd-a84d-59158bb9ffbc.name: Timeout
db9fdd1d-4a54-4bfd-a84d-59158bb9ffbc.one liner: The timeout term refers to a predefined period of time allowed to elapse before an event is to occur. Timeout may also refer to an event that takes place after a specified period of time elapses.

1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.name: Online Learning: The New Classroom
1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.title: Online Learning: The New Classroom
1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.one liner: Mark-Anthony Torrocha from coding school Coding Campus explains how online learning can be the best option if you are looking for flexibility, although you need to have commitment to make it work well.

bdc70028-0ae8-4e42-b0e6-5ebeaaba6908.name: Amazon Simpledb
bdc70028-0ae8-4e42-b0e6-5ebeaaba6908.one liner: Highly available schema-less attribute database that is part of the Amazon Web Services offering. Enables storage and retrieval of named items consisting of one or more key/value string pairs organized into domains. Item retrieval is done either by item name gets or through a sql-like language. Pay for what you use model with no minimum fees or startup costs.

c1959ac0-5844-474a-97fc-c45cb9057588.name: Geospatial
c1959ac0-5844-474a-97fc-c45cb9057588.one liner: pertaining to the geographic location and characteristics of natural or constructed features and boundaries on, above, or below the earth's surface; esp. referring to data that is geographic and spatial in nature.

9f2d3194-ff86-4c77-8e5d-e23435d0b7b4.name: OpenCV Computer Vision Application Programming [Video]
9f2d3194-ff86-4c77-8e5d-e23435d0b7b4.title: OpenCV Computer Vision Application Programming [Video]
9f2d3194-ff86-4c77-8e5d-e23435d0b7b4.one liner: Incorporate OpenCV's powerful computer vision application programming techniques to build and make your own applications stand out from the crowd

70816265-e703-4544-b5a7-c0058f75bbe4.name: Computer Vision
70816265-e703-4544-b5a7-c0058f75bbe4.one liner: Computer vision enables images, or sequences of images, to be processed by a computer using an algorithm. The aim of the algorithm is to extract information from the image. Sometimes this information produces an updated image or sometimes other measurements. An example of an updated image is to obtain the edges in the image --- called edge detection.

464278f9-ac42-4f72-8af5-cdd84c99f128.name: Char
464278f9-ac42-4f72-8af5-cdd84c99f128.one liner: char typically refers to a character data-type, representing letters of text.

26b7a3bc-d9b3-4c74-b38d-163b07563326.name: C++
26b7a3bc-d9b3-4c74-b38d-163b07563326.one liner: C++ is a general-purpose programming language based on C. Use this tag for questions about code compiled with a C++ compiler.

2b1f1e91-afc8-4a4b-b218-a1f5474b2d58.name: Python Programming for Arduino
2b1f1e91-afc8-4a4b-b218-a1f5474b2d58.title: Python Programming for Arduino
2b1f1e91-afc8-4a4b-b218-a1f5474b2d58.one liner: Develop practical Internet of Things prototypes and applications with Arduino and Python

d553f569-129e-42f0-8408-cee35ebf9e05.name: Proxy
d553f569-129e-42f0-8408-cee35ebf9e05.one liner: A proxy is a device or program that stands between two or more interconnected programs or devices.  Reasons for a proxy include one or more connected parties only wanting the other to access specific data.  A proxy provides a method for this.

ab31a3c2-6b0d-4ce4-8fad-5bc27c66ee69.name: Salt
ab31a3c2-6b0d-4ce4-8fad-5bc27c66ee69.one liner: Cryptography function that takes random bits and a string (typically a password) and uses a one-way hash to provide a new string that can be used for authentication without providing access to the original string. If a salt function uses enough random bits, the resulting string is generally considered cryptographically secure.

f14513c4-ceb1-4d5f-90be-5ba7df91f76e.name: Timer
f14513c4-ceb1-4d5f-90be-5ba7df91f76e.one liner: Timer is a control that has the functionality to trigger a user defined action at regular intervals as configured by the user.

35155242-f194-437c-a587-4b0680894d8a.name: Wordnet
35155242-f194-437c-a587-4b0680894d8a.one liner: WordNet is a lexical database for the English language. It groups English words into sets of synonyms called synsets, provides short, general definitions, and records the various semantic relations between these synonym sets.

0eb087f6-b0ac-492b-af42-d56357487ddf.name: Routes
0eb087f6-b0ac-492b-af42-d56357487ddf.one liner: Questions about mapping URLs to Controllers and Actions.

b77dc90f-8875-4e67-8f10-3dbe320a3668.name: Reasoning
b77dc90f-8875-4e67-8f10-3dbe320a3668.one liner: Reasoning is the act of drawing conclusions, judgments, or inferences from facts or premises.

8a4ae2e4-0327-44b9-9417-b3533997f6f9.name: Legacy
8a4ae2e4-0327-44b9-9417-b3533997f6f9.one liner: A legacy system is an old application, technology, mainframe, method, etc., still having an influence on an organization.

5eb523ab-1e8d-46e9-a386-0094e46f5192.name: Voice Recognition
5eb523ab-1e8d-46e9-a386-0094e46f5192.one liner: Voice Recognition means identification of the person talking and is frequently misapplied to mean "Speech Recognition" - identification of what is being said.

ae9c195f-67d6-4a8a-adad-a3f923b3bde0.name: Amazon S3 Cookbook (n)
ae9c195f-67d6-4a8a-adad-a3f923b3bde0.title: Amazon S3 Cookbook
ae9c195f-67d6-4a8a-adad-a3f923b3bde0.one liner: Over 30 hands-on recipes that will get you up and running with Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) efficiently

7f110ade-7cda-4c38-85a6-9bcce92c4a78.name: Artificial Intelligence
7f110ade-7cda-4c38-85a6-9bcce92c4a78.one liner: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the branch of computer science and technology that studies the development of machines able to simulate aspects of human intelligence. This tag may also refer to the part of a computer game application that controls the behavior of the virtual characters with which the player may interact during the game.

db5f05c5-73eb-46e1-8823-1afac8d92c18.name: Pivot
db5f05c5-73eb-46e1-8823-1afac8d92c18.one liner: The PIVOT syntax converts row data into columnar data, and vice versa for the UNPIVOT syntax.  Not all databases support the PIVOT syntax but the functionality can be implemented, often using decision logic (CASE statements, etc) and aggregate functions.

50a2d4fb-0159-46aa-86fd-e17d8c3b8ee3.name: Instant Data Intensive Apps with pandas How-to
50a2d4fb-0159-46aa-86fd-e17d8c3b8ee3.title: Instant Data Intensive Apps with pandas How-to
50a2d4fb-0159-46aa-86fd-e17d8c3b8ee3.one liner: Manipulate, visualize, and analyze your data with pandas

0e3119a2-40c8-4f33-85c4-af3a8d1e6efa.name: Algorithm
0e3119a2-40c8-4f33-85c4-af3a8d1e6efa.one liner: An algorithm is a sequence of well-defined steps that defines an abstract solution to a problem. Use this tag when your issue is related to algorithm design.

4c24149a-7d4c-4792-a51f-0144fb58f74a.name: OPENSHIFT COOKBOOK
4c24149a-7d4c-4792-a51f-0144fb58f74a.title: OpenShift Cookbook
4c24149a-7d4c-4792-a51f-0144fb58f74a.one liner: Over 100 hands-on recipes that will help you create, deploy, manage, and scale OpenShift applications

c2a57bac-b17e-4a57-92ef-81713c4a26c3.name: Match
c2a57bac-b17e-4a57-92ef-81713c4a26c3.one liner: A programming concept about finding results based on some kind of search. Typically used when talking about regular expressions.

e2e54ecc-1e2e-4761-9c65-80e361783f18.name: Internals
e2e54ecc-1e2e-4761-9c65-80e361783f18.one liner: The internals tag denotes questions about how things work, as opposed to how to accomplish something specific. Of course, how something works underneath will have practical implications, but internals questions aren't about how to do something; rather, how to understand something.

0b6e0b2c-ffdf-4291-98c4-668d08ba6692.name: Cloud
0b6e0b2c-ffdf-4291-98c4-668d08ba6692.one liner: Cloud computing is about hardware-based services involving computing, network and storage capacities. These services are provided on-demand, hosted by the cloud provider and can easily scale up and down.

5ed3ca30-2203-4972-a829-0269d2b600a0.name: Newsletter
5ed3ca30-2203-4972-a829-0269d2b600a0.one liner: A email or document containing a one or more news stories that will be distributed to a group of subscribers.

0fe72236-4782-4300-a733-e5b1fda5b305.name: Redis Essentials
0fe72236-4782-4300-a733-e5b1fda5b305.title: Redis Essentials
0fe72236-4782-4300-a733-e5b1fda5b305.one liner: Harness the power of Redis to integrate and manage your projects efficiently

b9d567f2-dd56-4a43-9d7a-2fbc06ea27e0.name: Opengl
b9d567f2-dd56-4a43-9d7a-2fbc06ea27e0.one liner:
OpenGL is a graphics standard and API which is platform independent and available for desktop, workstation and mobile devices. It is designed to provide hardware-accelerated rendering, and hence gives greatly improved performance over traditional software rendering.
OpenGL is used for applications like CAD software and computer games. The OpenGL standard, as well as OpenGL ES, is controlled by the Khronos group.

0ce22499-f653-472e-9316-3060528d0996.name: Raspberry Pi Projects for Kids
0ce22499-f653-472e-9316-3060528d0996.title: Raspberry Pi Projects for Kids
0ce22499-f653-472e-9316-3060528d0996.one liner: Start your own coding adventure with your kids by creating cool and exciting games and applications on the Raspberry Pi.

8006035e-ede4-4e17-9afc-4a54ef04f03f.name: Temp
8006035e-ede4-4e17-9afc-4a54ef04f03f.one liner: A common directory on a file system which acts as a "scratch area" that can be used to hold files and directories for short periods of time.

6c585d50-bc3b-4e31-9b93-1673de83a8d5.name: Overhead
6c585d50-bc3b-4e31-9b93-1673de83a8d5.one liner: Overhead is any combination of excess or indirect computation time, memory, bandwidth, or other resources that are required to attain a particular goal.

d931d679-9c41-4c24-bc29-32f15d5048f6.name: Mastering ExtJS - Second Edition
d931d679-9c41-4c24-bc29-32f15d5048f6.title: Mastering Ext JS - Second Edition
d931d679-9c41-4c24-bc29-32f15d5048f6.one liner: Learn how to develop advanced and efficient Internet applications with Ext JS

34000b13-ac17-432b-9166-9f59922ddfa6.name: Jade
34000b13-ac17-432b-9166-9f59922ddfa6.one liner:
High performance templating engine heavily influenced by Haml

If you're looking for the Java Agent DEvelopment framework please use [tag:agents-jade] tag

a5ad4709-8251-42b7-a722-6235564b4af4.name: Maya
a5ad4709-8251-42b7-a722-6235564b4af4.one liner:
Autodesk Maya is a 3D modeling, animation and rendering tool used by many entertainment companies in film, TV and advertising.

Per the Stack Overflow FAQ, questions should be related to programming in Maya, not general usage. Consider posting general questions to graphicdesign.stackexchange.com

531c0075-073b-41f6-94f4-569ca213f34d.name: Crud
531c0075-073b-41f6-94f4-569ca213f34d.one liner: The four basic operations for a data management system : Create, Read, Update, Delete

8107235e-518e-4854-be00-26a9dcbf9c9a.name: Ldap
8107235e-518e-4854-be00-26a9dcbf9c9a.one liner: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol, an application protocol for reading and editing directories over an IP network.

c91480c0-5165-4dac-a047-c79af33d9d20.name: Filter
c91480c0-5165-4dac-a047-c79af33d9d20.one liner: A program or routine that blocks access to data that meet a particular criterion. An example would be a "Web filter" that screens out adult websites. Do NOT use this tag for Java servlet filters. Use [servlet-filters] instead.

177e95dc-989b-46d1-8184-ed0028f0f5b3.name: MASTERING PYCHARM
177e95dc-989b-46d1-8184-ed0028f0f5b3.title: Mastering Pycharm
177e95dc-989b-46d1-8184-ed0028f0f5b3.one liner: Use PyCharm with fluid efficiency to write idiomatic python code

9648ae9d-1d11-4db3-85ac-986b059ad17b.name: Iteration
9648ae9d-1d11-4db3-85ac-986b059ad17b.one liner: Iterations are the successive repetitions in loops such as for, foreach or while. Questions with this tag are often concerned about how to best handle a collection of data.

184ee663-3f10-404d-8fe2-7064535dc558.name: Django Test Driven Development
184ee663-3f10-404d-8fe2-7064535dc558.title: Test-Driven Development with Django
184ee663-3f10-404d-8fe2-7064535dc558.one liner: Develop powerful, fully-featured Django applications by writing tests first

e4fefb15-21c3-4bcc-9461-b1c3d4a6bdd1.name: Netflix
e4fefb15-21c3-4bcc-9461-b1c3d4a6bdd1.one liner: The netflix tag refers to questions related to Netflix API and its use. Netflix supports a JavaScript API and a REST API which allow you to integrate Netflix user services into an application.

0dac0b83-ed2e-493a-b49c-8dda4377cd1c.name: Wifi
0dac0b83-ed2e-493a-b49c-8dda4377cd1c.one liner: Wi-Fi is a trademark of the Wi-Fi Alliance. A Wi-Fi enabled device such as a personal computer, video game console, smartphone, or digital audio player can connect to the Internet when within range of a wireless network connected to the Internet.

3049f2b5-8eca-453e-912e-8b4072768d6f.name: Distance
3049f2b5-8eca-453e-912e-8b4072768d6f.one liner: Distance is a numerical description of how far apart objects are.

c63570f9-120d-4fd6-9131-1b1d28a6f50a.name: Html5
c63570f9-120d-4fd6-9131-1b1d28a6f50a.one liner: HTML5 (Hyper Text Markup Language, version 5) is an umbrella term for recent web technologies. It is also the latest iteration of HTML Became a W3C Recommendation in October 2014, introducing new elements and APIs.

88b0bbc7-5748-45c2-bd81-0d8a7d1643da.name: Highcharts Cookbook
88b0bbc7-5748-45c2-bd81-0d8a7d1643da.title: Highcharts Cookbook
88b0bbc7-5748-45c2-bd81-0d8a7d1643da.one liner: Javascript developers can add the most amazing charts to their web applications by using Highcharts and this step-by-step guide gives you the works with over 80 practical recipes. Unleash its potential.

4fe8e04a-5f4d-439b-9449-39b76f4b94ed.name: Shoes
4fe8e04a-5f4d-439b-9449-39b76f4b94ed.one liner:
Shoes is a cross-platform toolkit for writing graphical apps easily and artfully using Ruby.
Unlike most other GUI toolkits, Shoes is designed to be easy and straightforward without losing power.

3663e096-7663-4c31-915b-6d6df35c3e5b.name: ZeroVM: Virtualization Designed for the Cloud
3663e096-7663-4c31-915b-6d6df35c3e5b.title: ZeroVM: Virtualization Designed for the Cloud
3663e096-7663-4c31-915b-6d6df35c3e5b.one liner: ZeroVM is a lightweight virtualization technology based on Google Native Client (NaCl). While it shares some similarities with traditional hypervisors and container technologies, ZeroVM is unique in several respects. Unlike KVM and LXC, which provide an ...

c9d27b43-e96f-42f1-a47c-71ed01ba97e6.name: Mapping
c9d27b43-e96f-42f1-a47c-71ed01ba97e6.one liner: Corresponding every element of a given set to a unique element of another set or it may refer to a process of creating data element mappings between two distinct data models (objects)

286e5fd9-771b-43d4-a0ba-a1f836c97863.name: Tuples
286e5fd9-771b-43d4-a0ba-a1f836c97863.one liner: In programming, tuples are simple *product types*, representing ordered collections of types.

0481d410-ceb6-4248-bee8-8369907a9a72.name: User Experience
0481d410-ceb6-4248-bee8-8369907a9a72.one liner: the experiential, affective, meaningful and valuable aspects of human-computer interaction and product ownership, but also a person’s perceptions of the practical aspects such as utility, ease of use and efficiency of the system. Essentially, it's about how a person feels about using a product.

1ea91602-e2f1-4f7b-85e5-93e486a18137.name: Julia Lang
1ea91602-e2f1-4f7b-85e5-93e486a18137.one liner: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for technical computing, with syntax that is familiar to users of other technical computing environments.

0da0191d-b71d-4800-b4cd-994d67700220.name: Pebble Watch
0da0191d-b71d-4800-b4cd-994d67700220.one liner: Pebble Watch is a smartwatch with an e-paper display.

1a273b85-0cce-4feb-846c-e31929ad38f2.name: Nose
1a273b85-0cce-4feb-846c-e31929ad38f2.one liner: Nose is an alternate Python unittest discovery and running process. It is intended to mimic the behavior of py.test as much as is reasonably possible.

This tag is not about other uses of the word "kernel" - for example, questions about CUDA kernels should use the [cuda] or [cuda-kernel] tags.

Has built-in replication, Lua scripting, LRU eviction, transactions and different levels of on-disk persistence, high availability via Redis Sentinel and automatic partitioning with Redis Cluster.

8b306aa1-9a48-44d1-b129-4cf4528ab20c.one liner: JavaScript (not to be confused with Java) is a dynamic, weakly-typed language typically used for client-side scripting. Use this tag for questions regarding ECMAScript and its various dialects/implementations (excluding ActionScript). Unless a tag for a framework/library is also included, a pure JavaScript answer is expected.

1abc2fe8-8825-420a-b9dd-322a6ab1397f.name: IPython Interactive Computing and Visualization Cookbook
1abc2fe8-8825-420a-b9dd-322a6ab1397f.title: IPython Interactive Computing and Visualization Cookbook
1abc2fe8-8825-420a-b9dd-322a6ab1397f.one liner: Over 100 hands-on recipes to sharpen your skills in high-performance numerical computing and data science with Python

a47c6182-bf3b-4d08-8dbb-9c90eb81cb39.name: Getting Started with LevelDB
a47c6182-bf3b-4d08-8dbb-9c90eb81cb39.title: Getting Started with LevelDB
a47c6182-bf3b-4d08-8dbb-9c90eb81cb39.one liner: Learn how to build a high-performing app with an embedded database on iOS or OS X thanks to this superb, hands-on guide to LevelDB. Designed for beginners, but also a useful reference manual for the more experienced.

a4a585ab-c73c-48e4-b171-727713cfcf04.name: Building a portable Minecraft server for LAN parties in the park

a4a585ab-c73c-48e4-b171-727713cfcf04.one liner: This post shows how to build a small, portable minecraft server that you can use to host pop up crafting sessions no matter where you when the mood strikes.

ba200e5f-4982-4aca-a745-483072506c5f.name: Uart
ba200e5f-4982-4aca-a745-483072506c5f.one liner: A Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART) is used for serial communications over a computer or peripheral device serial port.

20c2e279-4c29-4c18-81d4-cdababa4b8d4.name: Arrays
20c2e279-4c29-4c18-81d4-cdababa4b8d4.one liner: An array is an ordered data structure consisting of a collection of elements (values or variables), each identified by one (single dimensional array or vector) or multiple indexes.

f3720cf3-d5c4-494d-9ae1-bcc817df092a.name: Command
f3720cf3-d5c4-494d-9ae1-bcc817df092a.one liner: A command is a directive to a computer program acting as an interpreter of some kind, in order to perform a specific task. Most commonly a command is a directive to some kind of command line interface, such as a shell.

2d69eb24-a404-472a-884b-f856116ad4ba.name: Biopython
2d69eb24-a404-472a-884b-f856116ad4ba.one liner: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation written in Python.

10f3f952-a56f-4b89-b6dd-c567082b1df7.name: Terminal
10f3f952-a56f-4b89-b6dd-c567082b1df7.one liner: A terminal or command-line interface is a text-only interface for interacting with an operating system or a piece of software. A user typically types commands into the terminal to perform specific tasks.

db84f31f-0795-4bf7-a5ff-f35292b3ff3d.name: Dictionary
db84f31f-0795-4bf7-a5ff-f35292b3ff3d.one liner: A dictionary in computer science is a data structure that maps keys to values such that given a key its corresponding value can be efficiently retrieved. For questions about Mapping Functions over collections of data, Please Use [map-function] tag; and for geography, [maps].

9e4f6728-b15e-4602-ae99-da9c2beb52c6.name: Nlp
9e4f6728-b15e-4602-ae99-da9c2beb52c6.one liner: Natural language processing (NLP) is a subfield of artificial intelligence and machine learning that involves transforming or extracting useful information from natural language data.

5c9e73aa-942b-44b1-a72a-45e527840cc5.name: Python Network Programming Cookbook
5c9e73aa-942b-44b1-a72a-45e527840cc5.title: Python Network Programming Cookbook
5c9e73aa-942b-44b1-a72a-45e527840cc5.one liner: This guide embraces the elegance and versatility of Python to assist any programmer or administrator who wants to create bespoke client/server networking applications using third-party libraries. Simply packed with recipes.

d36022df-acf1-48f1-a882-2a5e48a13193.name: Curl
d36022df-acf1-48f1-a882-2a5e48a13193.one liner: cURL is a computer software project providing a library and command-line tool for transferring data using various protocols such as HTTP, FTP and Telnet. The cURL project produces two products, libcurl and cURL. It was first released in 1997.

2d30c1bc-aada-4b02-bc1a-e4da0d8b40ea.name: Vector
2d30c1bc-aada-4b02-bc1a-e4da0d8b40ea.one liner: The Vector class implements a grow-able array of objects. Like an array, it contains components that can be accessed using an integer index. However, the size of a Vector can grow or shrink as needed to accommodate adding and removing items after the Vector has been created. Use 'vector-graphics' for graphic display.

9a3373f0-6272-4e97-91c4-14f53ade2647.name: Hierarchy
9a3373f0-6272-4e97-91c4-14f53ade2647.one liner: For issues relating to creating, maintaining, or displaying a hierarchy of data or resources, etc.

8dcb3d43-9ac5-4beb-804e-4036cf4a345c.name: RESTful Java Web Services, Second Edition
8dcb3d43-9ac5-4beb-804e-4036cf4a345c.title: RESTful Java Web Services - Second Edition
8dcb3d43-9ac5-4beb-804e-4036cf4a345c.one liner: Design scalable and robust RESTful web services with JAX-RS and Jersey extension APIs

6b7014fd-5fad-42a1-b47c-785318ed0918.name: Casting
6b7014fd-5fad-42a1-b47c-785318ed0918.one liner: Casting is a process where an object type is explicitly converted into another type if the conversion is allowed.

82edda88-b2ad-45b6-a294-6088fddd847d.name: Leaflet.js Essentials
82edda88-b2ad-45b6-a294-6088fddd847d.title: Leaflet.js Essentials

21ac28b3-6d7e-4c93-9d4d-b60f972c1882.name: Conditional Compilation
21ac28b3-6d7e-4c93-9d4d-b60f972c1882.one liner: Compilation of certain parts of source code will be included/excluded. This can be often reached by pre processing the source code in some way. Including/Excluding parts of the source may be controlled by pre processor keywords.

f07b4299-4d21-4834-99d9-6dc7098c3742.name: Docstring
f07b4299-4d21-4834-99d9-6dc7098c3742.one liner: A docstring is a string that occurs as the first statement in a module, function, class, or method definition, and is used to document the object in which it occurs.

b1abb2e5-c943-4148-837c-3ff982801fd1.name: Highcharts
b1abb2e5-c943-4148-837c-3ff982801fd1.one liner: Highcharts is a Javascript charting library that uses HTML, SVG, and VML. The editor offers both open source/nonprofit and commercial editions of the product.

da943e7d-2b65-4042-a550-43700942b329.name: Image
da943e7d-2b65-4042-a550-43700942b329.one liner: The image tag is for questions related to the loading, formatting, saving, compression, and display of images in the context of source code. This tag should also be used for assistance using various image libraries.

96d04b8d-14f9-41fe-9d1c-8f3dbbc500c1.name: Connect
96d04b8d-14f9-41fe-9d1c-8f3dbbc500c1.one liner: Connect is an extensible HTTP server framework for node, created by Sencha Labs providing high performance "plugins" known as middleware.

e1efb6ff-b1a6-45cc-9041-cb0444866a8d.name: ElasticSearch Cookbook - Second Edition

e1efb6ff-b1a6-45cc-9041-cb0444866a8d.one liner: Over 130 advanced recipes to search, analyze, deploy, manage, and monitor data effectively with ElasticSearch

fdeeb938-d644-44db-835a-1f28ce96a10c.name: Iterator
fdeeb938-d644-44db-835a-1f28ce96a10c.one liner: An iterator is an object-oriented programming pattern that allows traversal through a collection, agnostic of the actual implementation or object addresses in physical memory.

d11c0f8f-6cdc-48f7-b402-192b12ace25c.name: Sample
d11c0f8f-6cdc-48f7-b402-192b12ace25c.one liner: Small part of or a selection from something (code , logs , data and etc.), intended to show the structure, style, or nature of the whole.

699e33dd-27cd-4da9-9642-28b1a5783b0d.name: Uml
699e33dd-27cd-4da9-9642-28b1a5783b0d.one liner: Unified Modeling Language, an object modeling and specification language used in software engineering.

81ad65e3-e1de-4b2a-884d-02858b529d48.name: Ssh
81ad65e3-e1de-4b2a-884d-02858b529d48.one liner: Secure Shell - a network protocol for exchanging data throughout secure channel with most common uses of remote command execution (remote shell/console) and file transfer.

e33a3467-1c03-444a-a376-e07a09e6f088.name: Refactoring
e33a3467-1c03-444a-a376-e07a09e6f088.one liner: Refactoring is a disciplined technique for restructuring an existing body of code, altering its internal structure without changing its external behavior.

fd43c6fb-eade-4d33-b5da-b63b7633bf1d.one liner: pandas is a library for Panel Data manipulation and analysis, e.g. multidimensional time series and cross-sectional data sets commonly found in statistics, experimental science results, econometrics, or finance.

f0ae2657-54d2-4588-95cb-8147b14a05f0.name: Printing
f0ae2657-54d2-4588-95cb-8147b14a05f0.one liner: Printing is a process for reproducing text and images, typically with ink or toner, on paper using a printer.

002fab24-32c8-4e59-8b73-c471927ab886.name: Publish
002fab24-32c8-4e59-8b73-c471927ab886.one liner: To publish is the process to make something publicly available. This might be the stuff that happens inside a CRM system after editing an article and finally publishing it, or publishing a project artifact.
